statements: DELETE FROM bill_payments WHERE bill_name = 'Electricity Bill' AND payer_id = 101;
DELETE FROM bill_payments WHERE payment_id = 1 AND amount > 100;
DELETE FROM bill_payments WHERE payer_id = 3 AND due_date < '2023-01-31' AND reminder_enabled = TRUE;
DELETE FROM scheduled_queries WHERE last_executed < '2022-01-01' AND frequency = '1 day';
DELETE FROM bill_payments WHERE amount < 100 AND due_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM PaymentReminders WHERE reminder_id = 101 AND user_id = 201;
DELETE FROM ScheduledQueries WHERE active = false;
DELETE FROM scheduled_queries WHERE query_id IN (SELECT query_id FROM logs WHERE execution_result = 'error');
